Note by the Secrotary^Recent Ministerial changes having necessitated certain alterations In the personnel of some of the existing Cabinet Committees, the Prime MinisterJs instructions have beon obtained, and in accordance with his direction? I circulate for information a statement showing the personnel of the Cabinet Committees as now determined.,,(Sgd.) KcPcAo HANKSY. Secretary, Cabinet,2, Whitehall Gardens, SrW.16th April, 1921.
